description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Pacific Harbour, Fiji. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Fiji Island Bliss with Direct Beach Access, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
hotels.description: Head to the golden sun and sands of the tropics, where you'll find this dreamy resort wedged in its little triangle of beachfront bliss, sitting pretty in a pristine corner of the adventure capital of Fiji. Access to one of the island's longest beaches, two inviting lagoon pools and a ring of luxurious palms make this island retreat a bona fide paradise. Soak up the sunset from the bar, gazing over the crystal-clear waters of Beqa Lagoon, or lose yourself to complete bliss during a traditional, relaxing massage at the onsite spa. Take advantage of daily dining with breakfast and dinner included, featuring international delicacies prepared with the finest produce. Stop by the Pool Bar or Deli Restaurant to kick back with a refreshing drink, spend balmy days laid up beachside or venture further inland to see Fiji's unspoiled wilderness.

hotels.title: Fiji Pacific Harbour Beachfront Retreat with Direct Beach Access
hotels.description: The aquamarine waters, colourful coral reefs and pristine white beaches of Fiji's Pacific Harbour promise an enchanting escape like no other at The Pearl Resort. Perfectly positioned in Pacific Harbour, the adventure capital of Fiji, the resort's direct access to one of the island's longest beaches promises days filled with fishing, kayaking or snorkelling. Or, if it's relaxation you seek, bliss out at the waterside spa or simply kick back and soak up the sunset from the swim-up bar.

seo.title: Hotel a Pacific Harbour - Fiji Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Pacific Harbour, Fiji con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
